message.body: Ok! So I have recovered slightly from the onslaught of family- including my inlaws being here for 11 days! Do you want to come over Monday? And do you need maternity clothes?
Do you know if you're having a boy or a girl? And how far along are you?

I don't need anything at all but I definitely want company. I'd love to come Monday. I have no idea if I'm having a boy or a girl yet but I'm 16/17 weeks I guess if I do the math since 14week sonogram. We are so excited! I'm mainly exhausted all of the time because there is so much to do. How are you?
You can just let me know Monday before we head over- we're always home
